title: Normal function of ALS and dementia linked gene determined for the first time

title_detail.value: Normal function of ALS and dementia linked gene determined for the first time

summary: The normal function of a gene associated with the neurodegenerative diseases amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) and frontotemporal dementia (FTD) has been determined for the first time.

summary_detail.value: The normal function of a gene associated with the neurodegenerative diseases amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) and frontotemporal dementia (FTD) has been determined for the first time.
